text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Raymah | native_name = ريمة | native_name_lang = ar | settlement_type = Governorate | image_map = Raymah in Yemen.svg | map_alt = | map_caption = | coordinates = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Yemen | seat_type = | seat = Raymah | government_footnotes = | leader_party = | leader_title = | leader_name = | unit_pref = Metric | area_total_km2 = 2442 | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 475,000 | population_as_of = 2011 | population_density_km2 = auto | population_note = | iso_code = | website = | footnotes = }} Raymah ( ) is a governorate of Yemen.
